name: Hero of Luxuria
description:
Immerse yourself in the fantasy world of Hero of Luxuria. Save the world from the danger hanging over it.

Hero of Luxuria is a Clicker game with elements of Strategy and Tower defense in an Anime fantasy setting.



Rescue 50 priestesses from the evil Avaritia who imprisoned beautiful maidens in a magical prison and enslaved the world. An extensive technology tree will help you with this. The development of tech will help you in the fight against hordes of enemies who will try to stop you.

Accumulate enough resources and destroy the barriers of the magical prison. Free all the beautiful priestesses by fighting Avaritia's minions.

Protect 4 temples of the Goddess Luxuria located in different parts of the world in order to accumulate enough Love Potions. This is a very important resource because only with the help of Love Potions can the seal of the magical prison be broken, in which all the Priestesses of Love and the Goddess Luxuria herself are imprisoned.

Your efforts will not go unrewarded. In addition to their boundless gratitude, the priestesses of love will reward you with fifty arts with their hot images. And, furthermore they will make a feasible contribution to the fight against the evil Avaritia.

Marry three High Priestesses of Love and you will be able to enlist powerful bonuses and unique abilities that they possess.



  • Breathtaking gameplay based on Point & Click with elements of strategy and Tower defense;
  • 4 different locations;
  • 50 erotic arts featuring fantasy creatures from 4 different corners of the game world, ranging from beautiful elves to characters of ancient myths and fairy tales: centaur, mermaid, vampire, etc.;
  • Among the 50 saved priestesses there will be 3 High Priestesses, taking them as wives and training them will give you additional bonuses;
  • Thematic music compositions for 4 different locations in the game;
  • There are 24 technologies available for study that will help you win.
